/* USE : KioskSideOptionMapper.getSideSdselClassList */ SELECT thpsc.SDSEL_GRP_CD, thpsg.SDSEL_GRP_NM, thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_CD, thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_NM, NVL(thpsg.SDSEL_TYPE_FG, 'C') AS SDSEL_TYPE_FG, thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_EN_NM, thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_CN_NM, thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_JP_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_CLASS thpsc, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_SDSEL_GROUP thpsg WHERE thpsc.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpsc.USE_YN = 'Y' AND thpsg.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thpsc.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpsg.SDSEL_GRP_CD (+)= thpsc.SDSEL_GRP_CD
AND thpsg.SDSEL_TYPE_FG = #{sdselTypeFg}
AND thpsc.SDSEL_GRP_CD LIKE '%'|| #{sdselGrpCd} ||'%'
AND thpsg.SDSEL_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{sdselGrpNm} ||'%'
AND thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_CD LIKE '%'|| #{sdselClassCd} ||'%'
AND thpsc.SDSEL_CLASS_NM LIKE '%'|| #{sdselClassNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY thpsc.SDSEL_GRP_CD, SDSEL_CLASS_CD

/* USE : KioskSideOptionMapper.getOptionGrpList */ SELECT thpog.OPTION_GRP_CD, thpog.OPTION_GRP_NM, thpog.OPTION_GRP_EN_NM, thpog.OPTION_GRP_CN_NM, thpog.OPTION_GRP_JP_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION_GROUP thpog WHERE thpog.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpog.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND thpog.OPTION_GRP_CD LIKE '%'|| #{optionGrpCd} ||'%'
AND thpog.OPTION_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{optionGrpNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY thpog.OPTION_GRP_CD

/* USE : KioskSideOptionMapper.getOptionValList */ SELECT thpov.OPTION_GRP_CD, thpog.OPTION_GRP_NM, thpov.OPTION_VAL_CD, thpov.OPTION_VAL_NM, thpov.OPTION_VAL_EN_NM, thpov.OPTION_VAL_CN_NM, thpov.OPTION_VAL_JP_NM FROM TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION_VAL thpov, TB_HQ_PRODUCT_OPTION_GROUP thpog WHERE thpov.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND thpog.HQ_OFFICE_CD (+)= thpov.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND thpog.OPTION_GRP_CD (+)= thpov.OPTION_GRP_CD
AND thpov.OPTION_GRP_CD LIKE '%'|| #{optionGrpCd} ||'%'
AND thpog.OPTION_GRP_NM LIKE '%'|| #{optionGrpNm} ||'%'
AND thpov.OPTION_VAL_CD LIKE '%'|| #{optionValCd} ||'%'
AND thpov.OPTION_VAL_NM LIKE '%'|| #{optionValNm} ||'%'
ORDER BY thpov.OPTION_GRP_CD, thpov.OPTION_VAL_CD
